EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_PAIR_Q217.Munich_Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You are confirmed - Pivotal Analytics Roadshow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering! Please see your event details below.
Please feel free to invite <[[mailto:?body=https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-analytics-innovation-roadshow/munich&subject=Recommending this Pivotal event]]> your colleagues who may be interested in attending this event.
Date: Tuesday, 4 July 2017 {{my.Save the Date Munich:default=edit me}}
Time: 8.30am - 5.15pm
Location: Allianz SE, Königinstrasse 95, 80335 München, Germany, Building E, Conference room: E 04 22+23 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps/place/K%C3%B6niginstra%C3%9Fe+95,+80802+M%C3%BCnchen,+Germany/@48.1549133,11.5838448,16.08z/data=!4m5!3m4!1s0x479e75be18365515:0xb12b013be8413a01!8m2!3d48.1542!4d11.58707]]>)
Agenda: Review the full agenda HERE <[[pivotal.io/event/pivotal-analytics-innovation-roadshow/munich?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=PAIR-2017]]>
***The information below is only for the Data Science Workshop attendees (afternoon session) Workshop Prerequisites:
- Willingness to participate in a demanding, high-intensity training experience - Comfort with data analytic technologies preferred (statistics, mathematics, machine learning, SQL, R, Python)
Workshop Audience:
- Experienced data analysts and data engineers willing to work hard to achieve superior Data Science skills - Anyone else who wants to learn about Data Science using Pivotal software
Laptop Requirements:
- The workshop is a hands-on lab and requires attendees to provide their own laptop - The workshop will be using a cloud cluster. Windows students will need an SSH program installed such as MobaXterm (recommended). MacOS students will need a terminal program such as iTerm (recommended).
If you have any questions, feel free to email Marie-Jeanne Dougados at mdougados@pivotal.io <[[mailto:mdougados@pivotal.io]]>.
Sincerely,
The Pivotal Team
